dmca.title: Copyright Violation Complaint of A Website
dmca.body:
NC

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Timeless Treasures [mailto:sales@timelesssilver.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2005 10:17 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Violation Complaint of A Website

 

Hi -

 

I made a mistake in your email address the first time I sent this email to
you and it came back to me, so I am resending it to you, in hopes that you
can do something about this website www.smgl.org.  I've also included the
response I received back from SMGL's president at the end of this email,
along with my response to his email.  I have not received a response from my
2nd email that I sent him.  

 

As you can tell, I am VERY upset with this company.  

 

Thank you.  I appreciate all the help you can give me.

 

Donna Stephens

Timeless Treasures

www.TimelessSilver.com

 

 

----- Original Message ----- 

From: Timeless <mailto:sales@timelesssilver.com>  Treasures 

To: copyright@theplant.com 

Sent: Sunday, February 06, 2005 4:51 PM

Subject: Copyright Violation Complaint of A Website

 

To Whom It May Concern -

 

I am a jewelry designer and my website name is www.timelesssilver.com and I
want to file a formal complaint against a website www.smgl.org that has
stolen my designs and well as my pictures from my website and put on their
website.  The pictures that they have stolen are of my men's jewelry designs
as well as my toe rings.   If you go to their website (you have to fill out
a form first to gain access) and go to the section called "Men's Jewellery",
you will see that all the designs on there belong to me (11 of them) as well
as the toe rings they have listed in that section as well.   I have the
original pictures to prove it.  The background of the pictures is the
wallpaper I used in my kitchen.   

 

I do not currently have these same pictures on my website now, because last
summer I updated several of my men's jewelry pictures to reflect a better
view of my jewelry.  So, SMGL has had my pictures on their website for over
8 months already, at least.  Even though I have updated my men's pictures on
my website, I haven't updated the women's jewelry pictures yet and they are
still in the original format.......so you can go through  the women's
necklaces, bracelets, etc. on my website you can see that the picture
backgrounds are the same and the pictures are made the same way.  My men's
pictures have been the only ones that I have updated.  The toe rings
pictures are still the same on my website though. 

 

Also, while I was on www.smgl.org 's site, I noticed several more pictures
from other websites that they had stolen also.  I have contacted each and
everyone of those websites and informed them of what SMGL has done.  Here
are the other websites (these are the only ones that I had recognized their
pictures)  that they have stolen pictures from and which categories on
SMGL's website that the stolen pictures are located.

 

www.jewelry-by-anixi.com  ("pendant" pictures stolen)

www.mijewels.com ("bali hoop earrings" pictures stolen)

www.walshbrothers.com ("men's jewelry" - bracelet picture stolen)

www.shauryinternational.com ("sterling silver chains" pictures stolen).

 

It is a crying shame that a person works so hard to get a website looking
good and pay good money for optimization, and then someone else comes along
and steals our pictures and ideas from us and then sells the items on their
website for a fraction of the cost.  There is no telling how many other
websites that they have stolen from........I found 5 websites myself
(including mine).

 

I have written SMGL an email and demanded that they remove my pictures and
haven't heard back from them yet.  A copy of my email is below as well as a
sample of the pictures that they have stolen from me along with the new
updated pictures that is currently on my website.  I still have all the old
pictures on my computer's hard drive, if you need them.  I did not include
all the pictures, but if you need them, I can send them to you.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter and I hope you can take those
thieves off the internet.

 

Donna Stephens

Timeless Treasures

3761 Brownlea Rd.

Silsbee, Texas  77656

Phone:  (409) 386-0544

URL:  www.TimelessSilver.com

 

 

HERE IS THE COPY OF THE EMAIL THAT I SENT TO SMGL.  AND THEN BELOW THIS
EMAIL ARE MY PICTURES TO PROVE THAT THEY STOLE THEM FROM MY WEBSITE.  IF YOU
NEED TO CONTACT MY WEB DESIGNERS, THEIR NAMES ARE DOUGLAS AND DEBRA MOORE
AND CAN BE REACHED AT (409) 246-4804.

 

 

----- Original Message ----- 

From: Timeless <mailto:sales@timelesssilver.com>  Treasures 

To: sales@smgl.org ; smglinc@sancharnet.in 

Sent: Sunday, February 06, 2005 3:13 PM

Subject: Jewelry Pictures 

 

Hello -

 

I just went on your website to look for some items to purchase for my
business and happened to see that you carried men's jewelry.  So out of
curiosity I went to look at what you had in your MEN'S JEWELLERY SECTION,
because I design men's jewelry myself and I found that you have STOLEN MY
DESIGNS AND STOLEN MY PICTURES FROM MY WEBSITE!!!!!.  I can't believe that
you have done that.   You also stole the Toe Ring Pictures from my website.


 

The men's jewelry pictures you have on your website are MINE AND NOT YOURS
!!!   You have infringed on my copyright of those designs.  Every one of
those pictures (except the gent's bracelet one) is mine.  The background of
the necklaces is the wallpaper from my kitchen......see if you can reproduce
that !!!   I designed all those men's necklaces and took the pictures myself
and I have the original pictures to prove it.  

 

What do you do, go around and steal other designers ideas and call them your
own.  That is disgraceful.  And besides that, all the money that you have
made off of my designs is rightfully mine.  I want all my pictures and
designs removed from your website immediately.   I also noticed that you
have stolen pictures from other websites that I have visited and I am
contacting each and everyone of those websites and informing them of what
you are doing.  TAKE YOUR OWN PICTURES AND THINK UP YOUR OWN DESIGNS AND
DON'T STEAL FROM OTHER PEOPLE !!  

 

I am also contacting www.theplanet.com and filing a copyright infringement
complaint against you.  Their policies clearly state that they will shut you
down for copyright infringement violations.  Also, I have told the other
jewelry designers to file a complaint with www.theplanet.com.  So be
expecting several complaints to your hosting service.  REMOVE ALL MY
PICTURES FROM YOUR SITE !!!!!!! 

 

PLEASE INFORM ME IMMEDIATELY WHEN MY PICTURES HAVE BEEN REMOVED!!!!   YOU
SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF YOURSELF!!!!!!

 

 

Donna Stephens

Timeless Treasures

 

 

HERE IS THE ONE OF MY ORIGINAL MEN'S JEWELRY PICTURES THAT I HAD ON MY
WEBSITE AND THEN BELOW IT YOU WILL SEE THE UPDATED PICTURE THAT IS ON MY
WEBSITE NOW.  THEN BELOW THESE YOU WILL SEE ONE OF MY WOMEN'S JEWELRY
PICTURES AND YOU CAN SEE THAT THE FORMAT AND THE BACKGROUND ARE THE SAME.  

 

 

 

THIS IS ONE THEY STOLE (this was the older picture on my website)



 

 

This is the new picture on my website now



 

 

 

 

THIS IS ONE THEY STOLE (this was the older picture on my website)



 

 

This is the new picture on my website now



 

 

 

 

 

 

Here are a few of the women's jewelry pictures that are still

on my website and you can see that the style of the picture is 

the same as well as the background.  



 

 

 

 



 

 

 



 

 

 

HIS RESPONSE TO MY EMAIL ------

 

----- Original Message ----- 

From: SMGL-GROUP [PRESIDENT] <mailto:president@smgl.org>  

To: Timeless <mailto:sales@timelesssilver.com>  Treasures 

Sent: Monday, February 07, 2005 12:38 AM

Subject: Re: Jewelry Pictures

 

you know we are direct source as well as custon house manufacturer also we
have a team who desing as per the customer choice so pls. dont blame on us
we run a honest co. and doing bsuiness since 1960.

 

we are forwarding your mail to our designing deptt and they will chek
everything about your claim.

and will send you a claim form inwhich you will have to fill all the
relevent information.

 

dont take tension if our team find that these design you have copyright
immediate we would like to remove from our site. we would never like to sell
your designs.

we are doing a healthy business.

 

let me know more about you as well as your web site addressee.

i forget to inform you that four more web site owner had claimed for the
same in todays mail?????????????

 

would like to get the copy receive from them wherein thesy had
claimed???????????????

 

 

thanking you

 

KUMAR'-
PRESIDENT
SMGL CORPORATION [ SUB.OF SMGL GROUP]
jaipur ,india
president@smgl.org
www.smgl.org
www.smgl.net
0091-93146-50911

 

 

 

 

MY RESPONSE BACK TO HIS EMAIL ------

 

 

----- Original Message ----- 

From: Timeless <mailto:sales@timelesssilver.com>  Treasures 

To: SMGL-GROUP <mailto:president@smgl.org>  [PRESIDENT] 

Sent: Monday, February 07, 2005 7:40 AM

Subject: Re: Jewelry Pictures

 

Kumar -

 

I don't care if you are a direct source or custom house manufacturer, you
have stolen pictures from other people's websites and have put them on your
website as your own.  That is copyright infringement and is illegal.  You
are a thief and a dishonest businessman.  I have all the original pictures
on my hard drive as well as my webmaster's hard drive and I want my pictures
taken off your site immediately.  You have stolen my designs and I will take
whatever action I can to have this situation resolved.   Every one of the
men's jewelry pictures (except the bracelet picture which belongs to Walsh
Brothers) and all the toe ring pictures are mine.  You even used my
descriptions straight from my website......you couldn't even be original on
that.  You're disgusting.   

 

I've already contacted your hosting service  www.theplanet.com , and have
given my website information to them along with all the necessary
information to prove you have stolen pictures and designs from both myself
and 4 other websites.  There is no telling how many other websites out there
that you have infringed upon.  If you think I'm going to give you my website
information now, for you to STEAL MORE designs, you're crazy.

 

It's amazing that you had 4 other websites contact you regarding this
dishonest tactic of yours, if it weren't true.  Why would they contact you
if you did not have their pictures also.  Give me a break.....YOU ARE A
THIEF AND YOU RUN A DISHONEST BUSINESS !!!!!  YOU SHOULD BE OFF THE
INTERNET.

 

Donna Stephens

Timeless Treasures
